name: Newt One
description: A nonviolent musical 3D Platformer The land of Groovy Hue was once bursting with music and color until the Great Slumber. Take control of Newt, a new tone in this musical land. Awakening this sleeping, silent world is Newt's rite of passage. Restore music, life, and color to the your world!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 8 Memory: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 2 GB available space
